full_summary:
**title-eng**: Microwave Signal Generator
**title-fra**: Générateur de signaux micro-ondes
=====================================

**Tender Details**

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01009106
* **Solicitation Number**: W6369-22-X059
* **Closing Date**: Thursday, January 5, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Description**

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals for the procurement of Microwave Signal Generator. The proposed system must meet the requirements outlined in the Annex A - Statement of Requirement. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering the system within 60 days of contract award. Deliverables will be ready for shipment from the delivery point to the consignee at the bidder's expense.

**Key Requirements**

* All deliverables must meet the specifications outlined in Section 5. Requirements of the Annex A - Statement of Requirement.
* Bidders must provide test equipment and accessories that meet all the specifications detailed in the Annex A.
* The basis of selection will be the compliant bidder offering the lowest-cost compliant proposal.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Documents and Contact**

The Request for Proposal (RFP) document can be found on the Supply and Services Canada website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/17/7cc843d2bbd93719e86bb913cf97b7e7/w6369-22-x059_microwave_signal_generator_rfp_.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/17/7cc843d2bbd93719e86bb913cf97b7e7/w6369-22-x059_microwave_signal_generator_rfp_.pdf)
